name: check-disk-usage
description: Check disk usage on the VPS and alert if any partition exceeds 85% capacity

_schema_notes.name: Unique tool name (VARCHAR 255), maps to foundry_tools.name
_schema_notes.description: What the tool does (TEXT), maps to foundry_tools.description
_schema_notes.command: Shell command or script to execute (TEXT), maps to foundry_tools.command
_schema_notes.created_by: Agent or system that created this tool (VARCHAR 100), default 'foundry'
_schema_notes.observed_from: Agent ID where the pattern was first observed (VARCHAR 100, FK to agents.id)
_schema_notes.usage_count: Number of times the tool has been used (INTEGER), incremented on each use
